thread.title: THE HARBOR SANITARY DISTRICT is accepting applications for
thread.title_full: THE HARBOR SANITARY DISTRICT is accepting applications for

title: THE HARBOR SANITARY DISTRICT is accepting applications for
text:
THE HARBOR SANITARY DISTRICT is accepting applications for ad date: 09/30/2015 
THE HARBOR SANITARY DISTRICT is accepting applications for the position of Maintenance Worker I for pump monitoring. this is a 3 hour per week position. 1.5 hours Saturday, 1.5 hours Sunday, Holidays and on call as needed with a rate of $15.00/per hour. Minimum requirements include: high school graduate or equivalency and must possess a valid Oregon drivers License with a clean driving record. Preference will be given to applicants with mechanical background. applications may be obtained and must be returned to the Harbor /sanitary District at 16408 Lower Harbor Rd., Brookings, OR 97415 or mailed to P.O. Box 2457, Harbor, OR 97415 541-469-5225, Monday-Thursday, between the hours of 9am-2pm. Drug testing may be required. E.O.E.
